name: Alien Defender 3D
description:
You have been sent to a planet covered with Aliens. Your task is to survive as long as possible. This game is action packed and loaded with Alien fun. Survive as long as possible. There are 10 Challenging Levels in total. Try to beat all the levels and go for the high score.

How to play: Shoot by pressing and holding on the Left side of the screen. Turn by sliding your finger on the Right side of the screen.

Good luck!
